Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item carries a significant value to me, reflecting years of expertise and innovation. I am offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $15000. This is a unique chance to acquire a piece that not only adds value to your collection but also stands as a testament to quality and craftsmanship. I trust that you will appreciate its true worth and consider this offer carefully. Looking forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
